About Me

About myself, my work and what I do?

Your project is my passion therefore it is in safe hands!

My projects are undertaken, and carried out by me and sometimes I may collaborate. My process involves research and design, that is carefully planned to achieve the particular aim my clients are after. Sometimes projects can be managerially viewed as a sequence of events, or a set of interrelated tasks to be executed over a fixed period and within certain cost and other limitations, depending on the project. Projects maybe temporary or permanent. Some of my past projects have been part of a wider programme management and dev team and other times on ad hoc basses.
